Articles.Content:
I've had a few dreams about it, and I want to play this game.

Basically, first a small credits plays, a very short one, saying the list of songs and authors. There are two players, either via online or hotseat. A popular (or user picked, but randomized) song plays, but the voice of the singer is always the same person, a sort of dull male voice. You have to guess the song and for bonus points, the singer. Get too many answers wrong and you lose the game. Score more points than your partner to win!

For some reason, this game is always re-created in minecraft in my dream.... and it's fun!

First thing that came to mind is Don't Forget the Lyrics! and Name That Tune. but those are both TV shows.

Google search for "guess the song played game" shows some possibilities.
Hehe that's cool. Sadly, all the songs that I found via googled games I have no idea about xP
